mapper.select: select s.score_list_c as scoresOfC , pif.real_name as playerName , e.name as eventName , e.id as eventId from scores s left join player_matches pm on s.player_match_id = pm.id left join player_info pif on pm.user_id = pif.id left join events e on pm.events_id = e.id where player_match_id = #{playerMatchId} and pm.events_id = events_id

select pm.id from scores s left join player_matches pm on s.player_match_id = pm.id left join player_info pif on pm.user_id = pif.id left join events e on pm.events_id = e.id where pm.events_id = #{eventId} ORDER BY s.score_c DESC
